roleset.name: rasp
roleset.note: RASP-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: moan (37.3), fizz (43.2), hand-checked by Kevin. Member of VNcls manner_speaking-37.3, sound_emission-43.2. (from rasp.01-v)

example.name: regular usage
example.text: He rasped, "My work is finished for now, I shall leave you to lick your wounds."
example.arg: My work is finished for now, I shall leave you to lick your wounds
